Params: {3: 'Deep inside her M.I.N.D., someone seems to be waiting for Lucia.'}
{3: 'But she quickly realizes that it is actually "Lucia" of the past.'}

{1: '1', 3: 'The projection of her past stands in the center of the platform in her M.I.N.D., slowly splitting into two similar-looking yet drastically different projections, walking toward different directions.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It seems that this is where we diverge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Alpha, I will accept your everythingâ€”your pain, your choices. So...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stands on the edge of where their M.I.N.D.s connect and reaches out to Lucia of the past. The moment she touches her, the M.I.N.D. starts to billow and surge...'}
